translations.value: Warning: No defensive systems detected. Coalition law requires immediate registration.
This is Admiral Veynar of the Coalition. You have crossed the Genesis Gate. Access is one-way, and you now fall under our jurisdiction. Identify yourself immediately.
Registry complete. Captain {{NAME}}, your identity is now logged. You may proceed to Horizon Prime — but remember, beyond this point, you are on your own.
